author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add test to check hits in partial wafers for V17 geometry

#### PR validation:

Use the test script in SimG4CMS/Calo/test/python to do the checking

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-sim120 Add test to check hits in partial wafers for V17 geometry
